snippet.title: PlayStation - Formula 1 97 (1997)
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
The most realistic PlayStation sports racing game of the '96 season returns with spectacular new features.
Built for the serious 32-bit racer, Formula 1 Championship Edition is fueled with lap after searing lap of Mach-speed thrills, AI-driven competitors, and down-to-the-tread realism.
- Contains all 13 Formula 1 teams, all 17 searing circuits, and a diverse collection of Formula 1-spec cars.
- Incredible 2-player split screen action, horizontally and vertically.
- Bone-jarring collisions designed from actual Formula 1 crash footage.
